reviews.text: Location was fairly central for the Ganges and other attractions and friendly staff and the size of the rooms were good. There is lot of opportunity to improve the service quality and type of food offered in buffet.
reviews.title: Centrally located property

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: What can I say. Definately the worst hotel we stayed in during our 18 days in India. Initially our room was filthy, dirty finger prints around the electrical fittings and a window you couldn't see out of, plus the room stunk of smoke. Eventually we were offered another room. This had only one light working in the bathroom and the fridge was broken. We asked the Deputy Manager about this and he promised to get it fixed. Over the course of two days we asked a further three times about fixing these and each time received profuse apologies and 'it will be fixed in five minutes', but nothing happened. When we dined in the restaurant on our last night my biryiani took an age to prepare, guess they don;t know how to prepare such an unfamiliar dish, and when it arrived it was chicken, not the mutton I had ordered. When I pointed this out to the waiter he took my fork, pushed it through the food on my plate and to his surprise came up with a drumstick! The previous day it had taken 45 minutes to prepare cheese on toast in an empty restaurant. Final straw when we went to leave they had mis-placed one of my signed receipts yet wanted me to settle their bill without all the dockets. Took them almost half an hour to locate this from their accounts department. Their level of incompetance was raised to new highs, what with lies, surley staff and my only advice to anyone rash enough to consider staying here is....NO, don't do it.
reviews.title: Sent to Room 101

reviews.text: But then was it all our fault, after all the room we were transfered to was 101!
reviews.title: The poorest hotel I ever stay

reviews.text: I stayed this hotel April 6th and I fill really disappointment.
reviews.title: Hot room but friendly staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: First, washroom is totally dirty. I can't shower because room was so dirty. Really sucks...
reviews.title: Mostly good, some bad
Nice experience and good location.
reviews.text: Overall, it was a nice experience staying in the HHI when I visited the Holy City. More than the location I should mention the design and architecture of the hotel that I was so impressed about. From the lobby the whole inner hotel is visible with the 99 rooms that are there. There is lobby in the centre surrounded by the rooms that goes to the 6th floor. The food at Aangan restaurant was good as well.

A very good hotel, situated in the heart of the business hub and city. The location and construction is as such,that ,despite being in the mid of the city, it isolates this place from the hustle and bustle of the city.The best part is the lobby,which is totally see through from bottom till the top.While moving up from lift,it gives a very beautiful picture of the hotel.Over all a very nice stay.
reviews.title: Worthful stay

reviews.text: Its a luvly luxurious place to stay. Ganges not far away nor the busy varanasi bazaars. Nyc atmosphere with a beautiful swimming pool.perfect place to live after a tiring tour. The hotel staff are very cooperative, service is good. The hotel even has 2 banquet halls thats a plus point.
reviews.title: Luxurious stay

reviews.text: I attended a wedding in Varanasi and dined here a few days later on the way back to the town my husband's family is from. I have read the other reviews and all I can say is that I loved the feel of the place from the moment I stepped into the cool and serene lobby with its impressive atrium and comfortable sitting areas. My husband and his family went to arrange for a table in the restaurant with all the wood panelling and glass ( there are two restaurants and I don't recall the names). This was the more formal of the two and I found that it did not disappoint. We had a constant "parade" of dishes that pleased the palate ; especially the chilli chicken and Chinese noodle ( chow mein) type dishes were awesome. Eggplant and other vegetarian dishes were also wonderful. White table cloths and attentive service complemented the overall "starched" experience - which was quite welcome to me ! A great place to eat and freshen up while staying in Varanasi or en route elsewhere ! We are now considering hosting the next family wedding here.
reviews.title: Hotel Restaurant - really good !

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for two days. The hotel was not too bad, but we were put into a single room, so the room was very small. It was central to everything. Food was not brilliant, however as I was not very well I spent most of the two days in bed. One redeeeming factor for my husband was that one of the bars allowed smoking! Would we stay here again, probably not.
reviews.title: Could have been better

reviews.text: We stayed for two nights recently. Hated everything about it. Nothing worked, everything was broken. Room key never worked. Had to keep going and having it recoded. Hot water non existent. Breakfast a joke. Dirty and old. Don't do it.
reviews.title: Disgusting.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Avoid if you can. The sheets in our room were damp and stained, paint was coming off the wall and hairs were in the bathtub. The manager couldn't find our booking when we checked in and wouldn't check for the confirmation e-mail we send to the hotel a day earlier. The Wifi isn't free even for guests (even the cheapest hostels in Varanasi have free wifi) and it's screamingly expensive at R160 per hour. I guess a saving factor would be the pool out the back if your willing to put up with staff perving through the windows. Breakfast was good on our first morning but really disappointing on the second. The bathrooms near the foyer were a disgrace!
reviews.title: Dirty rooms. Unhelpful staff

reviews.text: The hotel is excellent. Rooms neat and clean though of average size. Food is great especially the buffet dinner. The breakfast was complimentary in our package and was sumptuous. I will definitely go back again. However, it is not very close to the temple premises like all other hotels in its category.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel

reviews.text: While there are some signs of neglect or decay such as the portico overhead as one enters the hotel, the hotel & staff certainly worked hard to make a weary traveler feel at home. I arrived in Varanasi in the midst of monsoon season and a flooded Ganges which overwhelmed most of the ghats a visitor hopes to see but the hotel is set back from the crowds, traffic noise & pollution that partly defines this ancient city and represents a calm port in the storm. The room I had for 3 nights was clean & well appointed and the included buffet breakfast was excellent! The restaurant is well served by friendly, helpful staff and there is a very gracious greeter at the entry to the hotel in colorful regimental dress. Thee are numerous attractive shops in the lobby area and often an armed guard with heavy weaponry as well. I would certainly return to this hotel & feel comfortable recommending it as a pleasant, mid-price lodging.
reviews.title: Calm lodging in crowded city...

reviews.text: we stay during our Dambadive trip. Absolutely excellent experience. Very satisfied with the services and the amenities, food. Staff is very attentive and quick in service. Outstanding housekeeping service. Excellent breakfast. If I visit Varanasi, I'll once again stay in the same hotel, no doubts
reviews.title: excellent

reviews.text: Absolutely excellent experience. Very satisfied with the services and the amenities, food. Staff is very attentive and quick in service. Outstanding housekeeping service. Excellent breakfast. If I visit Varanasi, I'll once again stay in the same hotel, no doubts!
reviews.title: Fantastic experiance

reviews.text: Was a 1 night stay when i stayed here. The hotel is ok,rooms are just fine, a little upkeep is required though.Breakfast menu was fair.
reviews.title: Not bad

reviews.text: Overall it was a decent experience.The housekeeping staff were prompt.
reviews.title: AWSOME EXPERIENCE

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel's policy of checkout is surprisingly at 1000 hrs.
reviews.title: KEEP IT UP

reviews.text: Location is right in the middle of a busy street and is not far from the centre of the city.
reviews.title: Trip To Varanasi
